name: Login with SQL Injection Attempt
description: Attempt SQL injection in the username field.
steps: Step 1: Enter 'test@example.com' or '1'='1' --' in the 'Username or email address' field.
Step 2: Enter any password into the 'Password' field.
expected_results: Expected Result 1: The application should not execute the SQL injection and should handle the input securely. An error message indicating invalid credentials is expected.

elements.description: Username or email address input field
